issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

fields.description: VectorMapJoinFastBytesHashTable.allocateBucketArray() needs to check bounds before allocating array.
fields.summary: Vectorization : Check bounds of array before the allocation in VectorMapJoinFastBytesHashTable
